WICG/direct-sockets.comment: No clear implementation plan, considered as harmful by Mozilla https://github.com/mozilla/standards-positions/issues/431

w3c/webrtc-extensions.comment: a kitchen-sink delta spec for now - might lead to a new integrated webrtc NV spec

WICG/aom.comment: Specs at https://wicg.github.io/aom/spec/computed-accessibility-tree.html https://wicg.github.io/aom/spec/virtual-accessibility-nodes.html https://wicg.github.io/aom/spec/input-events.html in their very early stage of definition

WICG/container-queries.comment: Likely candidate for ignoring - see archival discussion at https://github.com/WICG/container-queries/issues/14

w3c/webappsec-suborigins.comment: Seems dormant, but not clear signal to that effect

immersive-web/webxr-test-api.comment: Exposes IDL not expected to be used in a regular browsing context; might still be OK to include once we get clarity out of https://github.com/heycam/webidl/issues/896

WICG/kv-storage.comment: Work on it suspended - this will probably be archived per https://github.com/WICG/admin/issues/121, but if it isn't, that may be because it is worth watching/monitoring; should check status on this at next review

w3c/merchantbg.comment: Not a spec, unclear future of the repo

WICG/handwriting-recognition.comment: Original trial in Chromium but no intent to implement announced yet

WICG/WebApiDevice.comment: no published content yet, but likely soon at https://wicg.github.io/WebApiDevice/device_attributes from https://github.com/WICG/WebApiDevice/blob/main/device_attributes/index.bs

WICG/color-api.comment: early exploration phase; no clear implementation plan yet

WICG/conditional-focus.comment: spec should get integrated in Screen Capture, see https://github.com/w3c/mediacapture-screen-share/issues/190

tc39/proposal-regexp-set-notation.comment: no published content yet, actual content in a Google Doc

https://drafts.csswg.org/css-block-3/.comment: Placholder for an eventual CSS Block Layout Level 3 Module

https://drafts.csswg.org/css-forms-1/.comment: Marked as not ready for implementation

https://drafts.csswg.org/css-page-templa.comment: Marked as not ready for implementation

https://drafts.css-houdini.org/box-tree-.comment: Marked as collection of ideas, no clear implementation plans yet

https://drafts.csswg.org/css-conditional.comment: Marked as not ready for implementation

https://svgwg.org/specs/markers/.comment: incomplete draft not being maintained, should be classified only as rough proposal per https://github.com/w3c/svgwg/issues/824#issuecomment-790946863

https://www.w3.org/TR/svg-markers/.comment: incomplete draft not being maintained, should be classified only as rough proposal per https://github.com/w3c/svgwg/issues/824#issuecomment-790946863

https://svgwg.org/specs/paths/.comment: incomplete draft not being maintained, should be classified only as rough proposal per https://github.com/w3c/svgwg/issues/824#issuecomment-790946863

https://www.w3.org/TR/svg-paths/.comment: incomplete draft not being maintained, should be classified only as rough proposal per https://github.com/w3c/svgwg/issues/824#issuecomment-790946863

https://w3c.github.io/PFE/RangeRequest.h.comment: being split-off from main spec https://github.com/w3c/PFE/pull/9/files; stub

https://wicg.github.io/nav-speculation/p.comment: Early draft that contains a collection of specification patches, origin trial in Chromium but no clear implementation plans yet https://chromestatus.com/feature/5355965538893824

https://wicg.github.io/nav-speculation/s.comment: Original trial in Chromium but no intent to implement announced yet https://chromestatus.com/feature/5740655424831488

https://www.w3.org/TR/clreq-gap/.comment: WG Note of clreq-gap document incorrectly published on the Rec track. Pending spec status fix in /TR, then entry can be dropped from monitor file

https://www.w3.org/TR/wasm-core-2/.comment: Weirdly formatted multipage spec with sub-sub-pages that would likely confuse extraction logic
